Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.util

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ImageRepository
    Used to load images once for performance and memory usage reasons [Singleton]
    ImageUtils
    Contains static methods for Image Manipulation
    WinningChecker
    Used to check whether the player won or lost and manage victory points
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    OutcomeReason
    Represents the reason the player won / lost the match
